item.title: Romantic Era
item.description: 1800 - 1850 Precedes [[Victorian Era]] Contained Supernatural elements glorification of past nature and its beauty emphasized intense emotion as an authentic source of aesthetic experience revived medievalism intuition and emotion to the rationalism of the Enlightenment “spontaneous overflow of powerful feelings” - [[Wordsworth]] Enlightment -> (Age of [[Samuel Johnson]]/Sensibility) -> Romantic -> Realism
